unnormalised: Ola and Uber auto fares in Bengaluru are set to increase by ₹5-₹10 per trip, effective 20/07/2024, according to sources at the Karnataka Transport Department. This hike is primarily attributed to rising fuel prices and increased operational costs for drivers. Experts recommend exploring BMTC bus routes for more economical travel options within the city, particularly for longer distances.
normalised: Ola and Uber auto fares in Bengaluru are set to increase by rupee five to rupee ten per trip, effective twentieth july two thousand and twenty four, according to sources at the Karnataka Transport Department. This hike is primarily attributed to rising fuel prices and increased operational costs for drivers. Experts recommend exploring B-M-T-C bus routes for more economical travel options within the city, particularly for longer distances.

unnormalised: Road trips from Bangalore are increasingly popular, but always prioritize safety. Ensure your vehicle is serviced before embarking on a journey. Popular destinations include Mysore (approx. 140 km), known for its palace, and Coorg (around 265 km), famous for coffee plantations. Remember to check road conditions and traffic updates on Google Maps before your trip.
normalised: Road trips from Bangalore are increasingly popular, but always prioritize safety. Ensure your vehicle is serviced before embarking on a journey. Popular destinations include Mysore (approximately one hundred and forty kilometer), known for its palace, and Coorg (around two hundred and sixty five kilometer), famous for coffee plantations. Remember to check road conditions and traffic updates on Google Maps before your trip.

unnormalised: For local commuting, consider exploring the metro's Purple and Green Lines. The Namma Metro offers a cheaper alternative to autos and taxis, especially during peak hours. Alternatively, pre-planning your routes and even trying carpooling with colleagues who stay nearby can help cut your spending on everyday travel.

Alternatively, pre-planning your routes and even trying carpooling with colleagues who stay nearby can help cut your spending on everyday travel.
